name: PANHELLENIC TOURIST GUIDE FEDERATION
goal: To protect and promote the interests of professional licensed tourist guides of Greece and the the guiding services the consumers recieve in Greece, to promote the national cultural, archaeological and historical heritage of Greece, to support tourist guides' high quality training, insurance, social security and life-long learning with conventions and seminars
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Transport
euInitiatives: Internal market, EPC, Package Travel, Tourism Policy, Cultural heritage Policy, Collaborative Economy, CPD, Accessible Tourism, Sustainability
